00042 #ifndef _orxTYPE_H_
00043 #define _orxTYPE_H_
00044 
00045 /* *** Uses orx declarations *** */
00046 #include "base/orxDecl.h"
00047 
00048 /* *** Platform dependent base types */
00049 
00050 /* Windows */
00051 #ifdef __orxWINDOWS__
00052 
00053   typedef void *                  orxHANDLE;
00054 
00055   typedef unsigned  long          orxU32;
00056   typedef unsigned  short         orxU16;
00057   typedef unsigned  char          orxU8;
00058 
00059   typedef signed    long          orxS32;
00060   typedef signed    short         orxS16;
00061   typedef signed    char          orxS8;
00062 
00063   typedef unsigned  long          orxBOOL;
00064 
00065   typedef float                   orxFLOAT;
00066   typedef double                  orxDOUBLE;
00067 
00068   typedef char                    orxCHAR;
00069   #define orxSTRING               orxCHAR *
00070 
00071   typedef orxU32                  orxENUM;
00072 
00073   #define orx2F(V)                ((orxFLOAT)(V))
00074 
00075   #define orxENUM_NONE            0xFFFFFFFFL
00076 
00077   /* Compiler specific */
00078   #ifdef __orxGCC__
00079 
00080     typedef unsigned  long long   orxU64;
00081     typedef signed    long long   orxS64;
00082 
00083   #endif /* __orxGCC__ */
00084   #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00085 
00086     typedef unsigned  __int64     orxU64;
00087     typedef signed    __int64     orxS64;
00088 
00089   #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00090 
00091 #else /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00092 
00093   /* Linux / Mac / iPhone / Android / Wii */
00094   #if defined(__orxLINUX__) || defined(__orxMAC__) || defined(__orxGP2X__) || defined(__orxWII__) || defined(__orxIPHONE__) || defined(__orxANDROID__)
00095 
00096     typedef void *                orxHANDLE;
00097 
00098     typedef unsigned  long long   orxU64;
00099     typedef unsigned  long        orxU32;
00100     typedef unsigned  short       orxU16;
00101     typedef unsigned  char        orxU8;
00102 
00103     typedef signed    long long   orxS64;
00104     typedef signed    long        orxS32;
00105     typedef signed    short       orxS16;
00106     typedef signed    char        orxS8;
00107 
00108     typedef unsigned  long        orxBOOL;
00109 
00110     typedef float                 orxFLOAT;
00111     typedef double                orxDOUBLE;
00112 
00113     typedef char                  orxCHAR;
00114     #define orxSTRING             orxCHAR *
00115 
00116     typedef orxU32                orxENUM;
00117 
00118     #define orx2F(V)              ((orxFLOAT)(V))
00119 
00120     #define orxENUM_NONE          0xFFFFFFFFL
00121 
00122   #endif /* __orxLINUX__ || __orxMAC__ || __orxGP2X__ || __orxWII__ || __orxIPHONE__ */
00123 
00124 #endif /* __orxWINDOWS__ */

00126 /* *** Misc constants *** */
00127 
00128 /* *** Boolean constants *** */
00129 #define orxFALSE                  ((orxBOOL)(1 != 1))
00130 #define orxTRUE                   ((orxBOOL)(1 == 1))
00131 
00132 
00133 /* *** Float constants *** */
00134 static const orxFLOAT             orxFLOAT_0            = orx2F(0.0f);
00135 static const orxFLOAT             orxFLOAT_1            = orx2F(1.0f);
00136 
00137

00139 static const orxU64               orxU64_UNDEFINED      = (orxU64)(-1);
00140 static const orxU32               orxU32_UNDEFINED      = (orxU32)(-1);

00142 static const orxU8                orxU8_UNDEFINED       = (orxU8)(-1);
00143 static const orxHANDLE            orxHANDLE_UNDEFINED   = (orxHANDLE)(-1);

00147 extern orxDLLAPI const orxSTRING  orxSTRING_EMPTY;
00148 extern orxDLLAPI const orxSTRING  orxSTRING_TRUE;
00149 extern orxDLLAPI const orxSTRING  orxSTRING_FALSE;

00153 #define orxCHAR_ASCII_NUMBER      128

00170 /* *** Status defines *** */
00171 typedef enum __orxSTATUS_t
00172 {
00173   orxSTATUS_FAILURE = 0,          
00174   orxSTATUS_SUCCESS,              
00176   orxSTATUS_NUMBER,               
00178   orxSTATUS_NONE = orxENUM_NONE
